product_name: Darn Tough Run No-Show Tab Socks - Women's
long_description: Featuring light cushioning, seamless construction and a sleek, snug fit, the women's Run No-Show Tab socks from Darn Tough deliver lasting comfort whether you're headed out for 5 miles or 15. Merino wool/nylon/spandex fabric blend is soft and breathable while providing the perfect amount of cushioning and stretch. Merino wool wicks away moisture and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort in a variety of conditions. Darn Tough Run No-Show Tab socks feature a streamlined fit and seamless construction to reduce blisters and chafing.
short_description: Featuring light cushioning, seamless construction and a sleek, snug fit, the women's Run No-Show Tab socks from Darn Tough deliver lasting comfort whether you're headed out for 5 miles or 15.
